calculations.name: YTD Value - Up
calculations.tableau_expression: if [YTD Value - YoY] > 0 then '↑' else '' END

calculation_context.Expression: if [YTD Value - YoY] > 0 then '↑' else '' END

calculated_fields.YTD Value - YoY: ([YTD Value] - [YTD Value - Last Year])/[YTD Value - Last Year]
calculated_fields.Measure Selector:
case [Parameters].[Measure Selector Param]
    when 'Profit' then [Profit]
    when 'Sales' then [Sales]
END
